definition: Yangcheng, a nickname for 廣州|广州[Guang3 zhou1]
sheep/goat/CL:頭|头[tou2],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Yang
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Some of the Eight Attractions in Guangzhou related to plant landscape were also described.
sentences.chinese: 同時還分析了歷代羊城八景中與植物相關的景點特色。

sentences.english: It is one of the eight new attractions in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 白雲山也是羊城新八景之一。

sentences.english: I sometimes read Yangcheng Evening Paper.
The activity "No Fake Products in Yangcheng" is going to start, are you going to attend?
sentences.chinese: 羊城無假貨的行動就要開始了，你們參加了嗎？

sentences.english: So Gunagzhou is sometimes called "Five Goats City"or" Rice Ears Castle".
sentences.chinese: 此後，人們就將廣州稱爲“羊城”或“穗城”。

sentences.english: Guangzhou metro does not offer refund and change service for Yang Cheng Tong.
sentences.chinese: 地鐵不辦理羊城通退票，換票業務。

sentences.english: The Olympic torch will start its Guangzhou journey Wednesday morning from Baiyun International Conference Center.
sentences.chinese: 奧運聖火7日將在羊城廣州傳遞。

definition: Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
south of the five ranges/old term for south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi
nickname for Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1]
Qingyuan prefecture level city in Guangdong
provincial capital
Panyu district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong/Panyu county in Guangdong province
Dongguan prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]
Dongjiang River
alternative name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/alternative name for Xinyang City, Henan 信陽市|信阳市[Xin4 yang2 Shi4]
Zhuhai prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China
Pearl River (Guangdong)
capital of a country
Yanjing, an old name for Beijing/capital of Yan at different periods
Wuzhou prefecture level city in Guangxi
Shaoguan prefecture level city in Guangdong
Southern China
